message.raw:
Fixed a bug where lock/unlock were switched

Unfortunately you can't unlock the widget once it is locked because the widget is unresponsive to user interaction (so the rightclick menu doesn't show up...)

message:
Fixed a bug where lock/unlock were switched

Unfortunately you can't unlock the widget once it is locked because the widget is unresponsive to user interaction (so the rightclick menu doesn't show up...)
